lexUnit.name: watch.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a small timepiece worn typically on a strap on one's wrist.

sentence.text: Their secretary , Mrs. Fryer , was presented with ` a spontaneous gift of a gold watch for her three years as secretary " .
